actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase from $2,100 to $3,600 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $3,600 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without any deductions from benefits under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase from $2,100 to $3,600 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
